mentions.tacticalSituation: Only Lynne Featherstone can beat Labour here. A vote for any other party could let Ed Miliband's Labour candidate in.

contactInformation.address: Sydney Charles, 56 Southwood Park, Southwood Lawn Road, London, N6 5SG

images.caption: Important information about your postal vote with instructions on how to vote by post for Lynne Featherstone, including a graph showing '2010 General Election Result - Hornsey & Wood Green' with results for Lib Dem, Lab, and Con.
